page_content: Discusses the planning and preparation for emergency situations, specifically in the context of chemical safety.
Provides information on the complaint procedure within the Canton of Aargau's administration.
Discusses various types of fraud, including telephone scams and online scams, with a brief mention of fake Microsoft support scams.
Appears to be a login page for accessing electronic services of the cantonal administration.
Provides information on how to apply for a firearms acquisition permit, mentions a software update related to layout changes in the permit.
Describes a workshop on graffiti and street art, including its history and techniques, for school classes.
Appears to be another login page for accessing electronic services of the cantonal administration.
